snippet: Mr. Hill, a soldier in the Luchese crime family until he turned government witness, was portrayed in Martin Scorsese’s acclaimed film “Goodfellas.”
abstract: Henry Hill, former mobster whose story inspired Martin Scorsese’s acclaimed film Goodfellas, dies at age 69.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hill, a soldier in the Luchese crime family until he turned government witness, was portrayed in Martin Scorsese’s acclaimed film “Goodfellas.”

headline.seo: Henry Hill, Mobster of ‘Goodfellas,’ Dies at 69
headline.main: Henry Hill, Mobster and Movie Inspiration, Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Henry Hill, Mobster and Movie Inspiration, Dies at 69
